attributes.action: Stop the FA changing the format of Grass Roots Football.
attributes.additional_details: This will stop the non technically gifted players at 4 years from being able to find a team. This needs stopping as it will damage youth football even more than years of FA changes will. This needs addressing.
attributes.background:
The FA will change the format of Grass roots Football. The FA think.this will encourage more time on the ball for kids playing but it will Stop the kids that aren't technically gifted from playing the game.
This needs addressing and only making voluntary.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the format of grassroots football are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
